text:
Weeks after revealing The Weeknd is her 'best friend', it seems Selena Gomez is revelling in her newfound friendship and eight-month romance with her boyfriend The Weeknd, by enjoying a Saturday night in with pizza and video games.

On Sunday morning, the Canadian singer (real name Abel Tesfaye) posted an adorable picture to Instagram Stories of him and his girlfriend cuddling on the couch.

This content is imported from Instagram. You may be able to find the same content in another format, or you may be able to find more information, at their web site.

In the snap, the 'Feel It Coming' singer appears to be holding an Xbox controller while sat mid-hug with Selena. Meanwhile, the 25-year-old former Disney star goes in for a snuggle with her beau.

On the coffee table in front of the pair appears to rest two plates of mini pizzas, as well as red plastic cups - evidence of a perfect Saturday night in as a couple.

theweeknd Instagram

The post comes a week after Selena and Abel were spotted enjoying a night of comedy at the Laugh Factory in Hollywood, months after The Weeknd came off his international Starboy tour.

Could these two be any cuter right now?
